de:
Amendment to Letter of Agreement between seco and the UNIDO concerning "Promoting the adaptation and adoption of RECP (resource efficient and cleaner production) through the establishment and operation of a Cleaner Production Centre (CPC) in Ukraine"
(Agreed to change paragraph 1 of provisions) - 11-07-2016 - Abkommen zwischen der Schweiz, vertreten durch das SECO, und der UNIDO betreffend die Förderung und Anwendung ressourceneffizienter und sauberer Produktion mittels Etablierung und Betreibung eines "Cleaner Production Centers" in der Ukraine
en:
Amendment to Letter of Agreement between seco and the UNIDO concerning "Promoting the adaptation and adoption of RECP (resource efficient and cleaner production) through the establishment and operation of a Cleaner Production Centre (CPC) in Ukraine"
(Agreed to change paragraph 1 of provisions) - 11-07-2016 - Letter of Agreement between the State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (seco) and the United Nations Industrial Development Organization (UNIDO) concerning "Promoting the adaptation and adoption of RECP (resource efficient and cleaner production) through the establishment and operation of a Cleaner Production Centre (CPC) in Ukraine"
fr:
Amendment to Letter of Agreement between seco and the UNIDO concerning "Promoting the adaptation and adoption of RECP (resource efficient and cleaner production) through the establishment and operation of a Cleaner Production Centre (CPC) in Ukraine"
(Agreed to change paragraph 1 of provisions) - 11-07-2016 - Accord entre la Suisse, représentée par le SECO, et l'ONUDI concernant la promotion et l'application de la production propre et efficiente au moyen de l'établissement et la gestion d'un Centre de Production Propre en Ukraine
